meanings.definition: The act of pulverizing something into a fine powder.
meanings.sent1: The pulverizations of the spices created a cloud of dust in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: After the machine finished its work, the pulverizations were so fine that they resembled flour.
meanings.sent3: The chef sneezed as the cloud of pulverizations settled on his nose.
meanings.sent4: The pulverizations of the rocks in the riverbed turned them into a soft, sandy substance.
meanings.sent5: The artist used the pulverizations of colored chalk to create a vibrant painting.

meanings.definition: The result of pulverizing something into a fine powder.
meanings.sent1: The baker added the pulverizations of almonds to the cake batter for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The pulverizations of the herbs added a burst of aroma to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved turning a stone into a pile of pulverizations.
meanings.sent4: The archaeologist carefully examined the pulverizations found at the ancient site.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the pulverizations under a microscope to analyze their composition.
